Name: OldFortressCover
Notes: A cover that can be moved once by activating its SW_A switch. Its "Move" animation specifies how it moves. After that, the cover will not disappear.

Obj_arg0.Name: Doesn't Open?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, SW_A will be ignored.

SW_A.Description: Opens when this switch gets activated.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
